_description: A schoolboy’s conjugation/declension rhyme — two quatrains (abcb, abab)

CULIi611.Transcription:
If capud Cumme of Capiowiche signifithe to takeThen may Rome
                    well [be] calledsoo wich doth no Thing forsakeIf þow decline
                    Capio CapisAnd to þe Groundes doo Cummehir nettes ar large and
                    cannot mysseTo Cache Bothe al and Summe
